name: Uphill Passenger Bus Driver
description:
Uphill Passenger Bus Driver is a bus driving game with thrill and challenging levels and game-play. Become the king of the road in this Uphill Passenger Bus Driver game and drive around the steep hills and mountains to reach to your destinations. Your bus passengers depend on your driving skills. Be the best bus driver in town. In this bus driving game you Take sharp turns and also try to follow traffic rules while Driving bus . Be very alert during reversing your bus because the bus is a very big vehicle and it has to be driven with precision and expertise.

Uphill Passenger Bus Driver: Features

3D Game-play.
Smooth and Responsive Controls
Thrilling missions.
HD Graphics.
